fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run "titanium build -h"

Actual:
Usage: titanium build --platform <platform> --platform <platform> --platform <platform> --platform <platform> [--build-only] [--force] [--project-dir <value>] [--sdk <value>] [--log-level <level>] [--build-only] [--force] [--project-dir <value>] [--sdk <value>] [--log-level <level>] [--build-only] [--force] [--project-dir <value>] [--sdk <value>] [--log-level <level>] [--build-only] [--force] [--project-dir <value>] [--sdk <value>] [--log-level <level>]

Expected:
Not to list --platform 4 times as you cannot pass multiple platforms at once
fields.summary: CLI: help for titanium build is displaying --platform 4 times in the usage
